patterns: How to check Adverse drug reaction?
Give me a list of drugs causing adverse behaviour
List all drugs suitable for patient with adverse reaction
which drugs dont have adverse reaction?
responses: To check adverse drug reaction Oral rechallenge is currently the gold statement but carries the risk of recrudescence of severe allergic symptoms other tests include skin pricktests,the lymphocyte transformation test,immunohistochemistry, and patch testing

Adverse drug reactions are classified into six types dose-related(Augmentation),non-dose-related(Bizarre),dose-related and time related(chronic),time-related(chronic),time-related(Delayed),withdrawal(End of use),and failure of therapy(Failure)

list of drugs causing adverse behaviour are mentioned as A total of 334 ADRs were reported. The majority of the ADRs were reported from antipsychotics (60.6%) followed by antidepressants (25.5%) and  antiepileptic drugs (5.8%). On further subgroup analysis of the drug classes among antipsychotics, Clozapine (15.8%) was the leading offending agent. Similarly, among Antidepressants, Escitalopram (6.1%) was causing the most side effects The most common ADR reported was sedation (7.26%) followed by salivary hypersecretion (6.7%), akathisia (5.52%), and weight gain (5.52%)

list of drugs suitable for patient with adverse drug reaction are Antihistamines decrease mild symptoms such as itching or a rash.Epinephrine is medicine used to treat severe allergic reactions such as anaphylaxis.steroids reduce  inflammation

The drugs that dont have adverse reaction is placebo a substance or treatment which is designed to have no therapeutic value common placebos include inert tablets(like sugar pills),inert injections(like saline),sham surgery,and other procedures

patterns: I want to log blood pressure results
responses: High blood pressure usually develops over time.it can happen because of unhealthy lifestyle choices,such as not getting enough regular physical activity
yes,please you should log by search
regular physical activity,eat less salt,add more potassium to diet,avoid alcohol consumption and reducing stress can lower blood pressure
